text.section: Nothing in this section shall limit, preclude, or otherwise restrict the practices of other licensed personnel in carrying out their duties under the terms of their license.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 14, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 201, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990.
